= SoapUI 3.0 container for testing =

This is a ''dockerized'' version of SoapUI which executes a series of tests to validate a proper deployment of the Arrowhead Core 3.0 containers.

== Usage ==

This assumes that you are using the Arrowhead Core 3.0 containers. Specifically, <code>arrowheadf/serviceregistry:3.0</code>, <code>arrowheadf/core:3.0</code> and <code>arrowheadf/simpleservicediscovery:3.0</code>.

<pre>docker run --rm \
           --volume tls:/tls \
           --volume tsig:/tsig \
           --hostname soapui.docker.ahf \
           --network ahf \
           --name=ahf-soapui arrowheadf/tests:3.0</pre>
Alternatively, you can use Docker Compose if you are running the containers from the source code repository.

<pre>docker-compose --file soapui/docker-compose.yml -p &quot;ahf&quot; up --build &amp;&amp; \
docker-compose --file soapui/docker-compose.yml -p &quot;ahf&quot; down -v</pre>
